content.title: Intro
content.content:
1978
Preceded by
1978
1979
Year
1980
Followed by
1980
You may also be looking for Third Age 1979.

Tolkien-related events that took place in 1979.

content.title: January
content.content: ? - Minas Tirith Evening-Star (Volume 8, Number 2) is published.

content.title: February
content.content: 17 - American composer Bear McCreary is born.

content.title: March
content.content:
25 - Actor Lee Pace is born.
31 - J.R.R. Tolkien: Scholar and Storyteller is published.

content.title: April
content.content:
15 - Actor Luke Evans is born.
28 - One Ring to Bind Them All: Tolkien's Mythology is published.
? - J.R.R. Tolkien's The Lord of the Rings Fotonovel is published.
? - Amon Hen 38 is published.

content.title: June
content.content:
? - Warren Special Edition: The Lord of the Rings is published.
? - Amon Hen 39 is published.

content.title: July
content.content:
12-15 - Mythcon 10.
25 - American writer and producer Bryan Cogman is born.

content.title: August
content.content:
3 - Actress Evangeline Lilly is born.
? - Amon Hen 40 is published3

content.title: September
content.content:
28-30 - Oxonmoot 1979.
29 - Scholars Humphrey Carpenter, George Sayer and Clyde S. Kilby deliver a public discussion on J.R.R. Tolkien at Wheaton College, Illinois (published as "A Dialogue: Discussion by Humphrey Carpenter, Professor George Sayer and Dr. Clyde S. Kilby").
? - The Individuated Hobbit is published.

content.title: October
content.content:
1 - The Jackanory episode "An Unexpected Party" is aired on the BBC.
2 - The Jackanory episode "Over Hill and Under Hill" is aired on the BBC.
3 - The Jackanory episode "Riddles in the Dark" is aired on the BBC.
4 - The Jackanory episode "Out of the Frying-Pan and Into the Fire" is aired on the BBC.
5 - The Jackanory episode "Flies and Spiders" is aired on the BBC.
8 - The Jackanory episode "Barrels Out of Bond" is aired on the BBC.
9 - The Jackanory episode "Inside Information" is aired on the BBC.
10 - The Jackanory episode "Fire and Water" is aired on the BBC.
11 - The Jackanory episode "The Clouds Burst" is aired on the BBC.
12 - The Jackanory episode "The Last Stage" is aired on the BBC.
18 - The Middle-earth Quiz Book is published.
? - Amon Hen 41 is published.

content.title: November
content.content:
1 - Pictures by J.R.R. Tolkien is first published in the UK.
19 - Pictures by J.R.R. Tolkien is published in the US.

? - National Public Radio airs The Lord of the Rings (1979 radio series)
? - National Public Radio airs The Hobbit (1979 radio series)
? - Tolkien's Art: A Mythology for England is published.
? - A Hobbit's Journal is published.
? - A Tolkien Bestiary is published.
? - The Lord of the Rings Film Calendar 1980 is released.
? - The J.R.R. Tolkien Desk Calendar 1980 is released.
? - The 1980 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar is released.
? - Mallorn 13 is published.
Years
1976 1977 1978 1979 1980 1981 1982
